caption: Where do I start with this place! Last year I googled Vegan places in the Bronx and it was sad to see there were not too many options. I came to NSV and have been addicted ever since. Mind you I love in Florida lol. My addiction is soooooo bad even when my husband goes to visit family in NY he always stops by and picks me up a big order of NSV. The food is amazing as well as the staff. Especially the owner, I have Dmed her on IG always letting her know how delicious the food is. I will be in NY next week and this will be my 1st and last stops! Cant wait!

(Translated by Google) Let the wavik be a fresh spice and you can't miss it, my beautiful ones, I will see that the emperor Diocletian loves the most when he drills all day long, he digs and watches ... on Sundays, my fat and corpses don't miss me, I don't need a tribune to a mature family ... it has already invented everything and everything ... the devil, without those influxes and sauces, the devil is taking them out ...  (Original) Nek je vavik friška spiza i nemoš falit ajte lipi moji vidit ća je car Dioklecian najviše volia kad je sam vrtal po cile dane okopava i pazia...nedilje mi mrs i lešine nit falu nit tribanu zrilu čeljadetu...u slast a sad je to već izmišalo sve i svašta ...nemere ti amer  bez tih priliva i soseva đava ih izia...

I’ve ordered from Next Stop Vegan a few times but was finally forced to write a review after finally trying the burrito. There food is good no doubt but that burrito had me second guessing if it was eating quinoa...it was lol. As always there flavors are fresh; the seasoning *chefs kiss*. Feels great to have a vegan spot so close to home.
I loved it!!! They are so nice and professional and the service was excellent!!! Definitely worth giving this place a try!! The food is delicious 😋
The food is delicious but I ordered the Chocolate Chip Cookies for $4.50. I received 1 cookie. It says cookies and it was only 1 cookie not worth the price and change the menu

It was our first time ordering, they are a couple of blocks from us and had some vegan friends over so decide why not. The pull pork sandwich was good but the bread got soggy so ate the filling without the bread. My daughter had the loaded nachos which was pretty good. But the best thing was the Mofonguitos with the Quinoa, wow that was delicious.
I bought a chimi, mofonguitos, pastelitos omg it was so delicious best vegan food.

Ohhhmyyygawdddd i love you guys The staff is always friendly ans the food is absolutely amazing.  I drive up 30 mins from white plains just to have their chimi & their yaroa fries!! I try to put all my friends on because they taste so authentic and it's FREAKING VEGAN!!
Love the Vegan food here and the service is always great. They have a great vegan menu and the service staff are very polite.

I'm not vegan but this caught my attention. I took my sister who is Vegan and we both liked the food. I though it was curious to have dominican street type food but vegan. They have patacon, chimi and empanadas. I would go back and and other dishes. Recommended.
Love the Mofongo! You gals rule!! Keep it going!🌱🌱🌱

I guess you have to have a real passion for becoming or straying out to the vegan side. It's a lot of mushrooms and truffle oil and I don't know I would go back of course and try it again but I don't see it becoming one of my favorites

Wow! Best food ever and it’s VEGAN. Not only just that, but it’s a DOMINICAN VEGAN spot. If you know, you know. I heard about this spot on instagram. I always wanted to try. I could not wait any longer. I figure yesterday I go because I had some time. There is many great options on their menu. I went for the “Truffle Mac N Cheese Sandwich”. Everything about this was on point. Definitely for a fact I will be going back again sometime soon.

If I could rate this place 10 stars I would. I found this place on Instagram. I traveled from Florida to Come try their food and didn’t know what to get. The young lady who attended me was very sweet and helpful with suggestions. All I can say is if you are ever in nyc or the Bronx trying their chimi is a must your vegan belly and taste buds will thank you 🙌🏽

Had the pleasure last night of eating this delicious food.  I was blown away by it.  Absolutely great food. The flavors, textures, presentations was great. I recommend it highly.  You will not be disappointed.

L👀k here, this is some AMAZING food!!! Hispanic food with a vegan twist, DELICIOUS!!! I would like to thank NEXT STOP VEGAN for their service and dedication to our community, their entire attitude and approach is embracing. In a nut shell “WHOLESOME”!! From the ambiance in their shop, to the flavor in the food. THANX SOOOOOOOOO MUCH!!!!  Eight to eighty, blind, cripple and crazy, we were all blessed by this food!! Thank you always.

Great staff very friendly, I actually left the store and my food wasn't complete in the bag. The owner was very helpful called me right away and left a message but I didn't receive it until I got home. She actually WENT OUT HER WAY TO DELIVERY THE FOOD TO MY DOOR to make sure my order was complete and it was Delicious definitely going back CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS IMMACULATE!!!

I’m not sure how this food got a 5 star rating. It was so disgusting, the fries were greasy, the black bean burger was flat out nasty and priced so high. The customer service was also bad. I eat vegan food a lot and never tasted a burger that bad, thin, soggy, and poorly made.
If you're looking for tasty vegan, this is a place you gotta try! The vibe, food and staff are just awesome!

Love this place. Not only is the food fabulous, but their Covid friendly food packaging is very thoughtful. I always get delivery and when you receive your food it is in a sealed bag. Also their tres leche cake (veg, nondairy) is to die for. So yummy and decadent. I love this place and I am not vegan!

Had the enjoyment of finally trying the patacon and I must say it was everything that it lived up 2. The flavor spices and amount was well worth the trip and tolls. The aftertaste alone shows that they know how to season. I love the fact it's all vegan no artificial wonder meat just good food made with love. Thank you so much
Wowww. Well worth the trip. So much flavor, I had the chimi and monfoguitos. Amazing, can't wait to go back and try the rest of the menu. Cookies they had were awesome as well.
Best vegan food ever You must try it ASAP!
Absolutely Love this place. Such a wonderful welcome to the neighborhood. The food is great and the service is awesome. Warm and friendly staff. Would recommend to anyone and everyone!
The workers are pleasant and the boss even better. It has a serene atmosphere. Oh yeah, the food is good too!👍🏾

I was referred by a friend and it did not  disappoint at all everything was on point..Thank you so much for the experience and finally being able to eat a chimi🇩🇴.Oh the Yaroa fries 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 are a must try ..
The best in the world..
Great chimis and made healthy.

I'm not vegan, or vegetarian, but I am Dominican. And when I tell you, I'd order from this place every day of the week, someone please double dog dare me to.  I ordered over the phone for pickup and the gentleman on the other line was super polite, patient, and accommodating. Our order was done in 15 min, if that. I drove 20 minutes home before I could even look at the food, but it smelled amazing!! And when I got home, my patacón chimi was not soggy, the plantain was super crispy, the presentation was flawless, the sauce...just get you one. Please, and you're welcome in advance.

(Translated by Google) Next Stop Vegan's vegan chimi is to die for. In Next Stop Vegan they do not play with higuine, especially during these times of pandemic. My experience when ordering through Uber Eats was super good ... My food came in a fully celled sleeve. You have taken very good security measures during these times. My respect to you. Blessings ❤️🥰  (Original) El vegan chimi de Next Stop Vegan esta para chuparse los dedos. En Next Stop Vegan no juegan con la higuine, más durante estos tiempos de pandemia. Mi experiencia cuando ordene por Uber Eats fue super buena... Mi comida llegó en una funda completamente cellada. Ustedes han tomado muy buenas medidas de seguridad durante estos tiempos. Mi respeto para ustedes. Bendiciones ❤️🥰

We are SO lucky to have Next Stop Vegan right here in the Bronx!  I enjoy their plant based meals, anything I order I can tell is homemade and made fresh.  My favorites include the homemade chinola and the truffle mozzarella bello sandwich!  The flavor combinations are mind blowing!  I love supporting local, women-owned small businesses!  One thing that stands out about Next Stop Vegan - is what they do for their community.  I have watched Blenlly of NSV participate in free virtual programs where she shares some of her free plant based recipes.  The NSV store is home to the Little Free Library, where the kids that stop by can participate in a free library/book program.  Finally, I have recently started a low-waste journey.  When I put in order notes asking for no plastic utensils or no plastic containers, most restaurants ignore me.  Not Next Stop Vegan!  They have actually gone out of their way to repackage my food using foil and no plastic wraps!  If it is not possible, they let me know and explain why - which is appreciated.  I truly appreciate their care and concern and attention to detail and order notes!!  :-).

I order online because live far, but every single bite of of food was delicious! Especially the Patagonia! This is a must go to place if you are in The Bronx or NYC!  It's vegan deliciousness and if you aren't vegan you will still fall in love with the food! The staff is great,  I remember I called one time over the phone to make sure it was open but unfortunately it wasn't and the staff apologized and informed me of the days they would be open. So please visit, or order online and enjoy!

What is not to like? The love that oozes from every fresh, hand made, well seasoned bite? The warm and friendly service? I’m obsessed, thankful for this establishment and the hard work of those who run it. Delicious!!!

Their food is beyond amazing! I feel like next stop vegans food helped my transition into veganism so much easier because they offer so many alternatives to food I grew up with. I introduced my family to their chimi and my dad stated that he wants to try the rest of the menu. Very high quality comfort food. Take all my money because I order weekly.

Love love love, this place as a Dominican I know how a chimi is supposed to taste and this one hits all the right spots but the best is is healthier for ur gut thanks sooo much I’m vegan and I’m one happy costumer ur food is delicious and ur staff the best thanks again for bringing it here to the Bronx for the world 💞💫✨🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽

I found this restaurant at the vegandale festival and I'm so happy I did! I've had their patacon, yarao and carne pastelitos, mofonguitos, nsv burrito, and the vegan chimi, and so far delicious! I love this place because as a vegan dominican, I missed having patacon and pastelitos. The food is always fresh and the flavors are amazing... not sure how they pack so much flavor into their food. Highly recommend.

NOTHING less than 5 STARS. The taste and texture of the food is surpassed only by the friendly staff. The prices are on par with the average cost of goods and services. (No cap) If I could, I’d eat here everyday.
best place ever hands down recommended to everyone

I’ve had the pleasure of enjoying Next Stop Vegan at a WeWork Corporate event. Needless to say, The food is delicious but the hospitality and the passion are also heavy contributors to the success of this Dominican, female owned small business. In a time when restaurants are hurting the most from Covid please consider trying this awesome place. I guarantee your meal will be exceptional.

The absolute BEST vegan restaurant I have ever eaten at. I am from Los Angeles and travel to New York specifically for this restaurant only. I schedule layovers at the airport JUST TO GET FOOD FROM THIS SPOT. LITERALLY. Do NOT miss it.
Amazing food and great service, you can taste the love it’s made with. Try it for yourself🎉🎉

Love love love! So happy I can enjoy Dominican food again. I’ve gone several times and they never disappoint. Also the staff is really friendly I always feel like I’m with family. My fiancé who isn’t vegan loves their Chimi patacon and pastelitos. Do yourself a favor and treat yourself everything on the menu is delicious although my absolute fav is the veganator.

Food is absolutely amazing! Anyone who is skeptical to try vegan needs to try NSV first...their food is always so fresh and flavorful you swear you was eating meat 😂 the patacón, chimi and cauliflower wings (seasonal) are my favorites!  I promise you...once you had their pastellito you’ll want to try their whole menu...I almost there 😂 😋

This gem is just what the Bronx needed! They’ve blessed us with delicious food and it’s all VEGAN! The pastelitos are bomb. Staff are super friendly and professional. A must go-to! They never disappoint.

I love this spot!!!!.because  I stopped eating  meat  since March 2020....I walk in I'm always greeted with warmness.& smiling  eyes ..I don't eat here  every  week bcze I don't always  walk around with cash.... I love every  dish I have ordered including the healthy  snacks...Your Vegan prices matches the other  restaurants in the neighborhood..Thanks again
Highly recommend. Affordable vegan food. It is made with natural ingredients. Love it!!  Can't seem to find a place like this anywhere in the bronx. Keep it coming!
Love the food! Liked everything I ever ordered 5 stars for sure ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Much from Long Island!!!

The food here is AMAZING!! Very FLAVORFUL and made with lots of LOVE! If you are transitioning being vegan or plant based this is a good spot to try out! MISSING out on eating your typical Dominican food/snacks... this is spot to hit up! You won’t regret it! 🙋🏻‍♀️❤️

Restaurant is overrated and food is overpriced, the patty seemed like cheap flour. Be careful of the staff and insist that they give you your change upfront. I visited the store and gave the cashier $20. I noticed she didn't give me my change back right away so I assumed that when my order was ready she would do so. I stepped out of the restaurant to keep an eye on my car and to also get something from the corner deli. I returned to the store to get my food and I asked for my change; the cashier lied to me and said she gave me $6 change when she didn't. Not wanting to make a scene I left the store. She took $20 for a meal that was not even worth $5. These people are shady and dishonest. I would not recommend eating here at all!!!!!
Delicious food! Loved the vibe
There isn’t one thing on the menu that I haven’t had and I can honestly say everything they make is delicious 😋 not to mention, they’re such beautiful souls ♥️

So, I have been on and vegetarian and vegan for many years because all we have is junk food in the Bronx. My digestive tract has been given me issues since the pandemic. I have decided to commit and dedicate better health and love to my body, so I started searching and found Next Stop Vegan. I have been eating here for about 2 weeks straight. My number one favorite is the Nachos and Pastelitos Yaroa and the Chimi sauce. The Patecon and Vegan Chimi are a delight. My son said Bllengy and her sister make that Quinoa taste like meat for him and he is a critic. He is in love. My friend and her fiance love it as well. My mom is impressed and now wants to be vegan. I also love the Juny salad! Hi Juny. The customer service is awesome wonderful family they know how to make a girl palate feel good.  Fan for life thank you Next Stop Vegan for coming to the Bronx.

I’ve been waiting to try this place for over a year now because I live in Florida and omg, it was so totally worth the wait. The chimi was delicious and my sister, who isn’t a vegan actually said it’s more flavorful than the regular chimi 😱 my mom, who is a big Dominican food critic loved it so it was a win for all of us. So good. I am in NYC for a few more days and I have to order again before going back home. Too good to not have again ❤️

I am completely sold. Today was my first time trying NSV and yes, believe the hype. The food is incredibly tasty and close to the “real” deal. The quinoa mixture is probably tastier than most real meat mixtures and the yaroa empanada had a perfect sweet and savory flavor. I really appreciate small businesses that give great attention to detail and it does not go unnoticed here. Thanks for creating healthier choice for the masses!
FOOD IS ALWAYS ON POINT!!!! Can’t even tell it’s vegan!

When I do order from NSV, I’m never disappointed! I typically order the same thing (chimi with extra cabbage and pastelitos lol) and they alwaysss put the extra cabbage! Even now, in these unprecedented times we’re living in, NSV makes sure your food is sealed so that no one can tamper with it! They’re  franchise restaurants not even taking this type of precaution! Thanks Blenny and Juni!

Incredible! I just started my plant based journey and Next Stop vegan made it so much easier. Their food is amazing and the workers there are a delight to speak with. It’s refreshing to have a place like this in the community. They truly show the versatility that veganism can be. The pastelito de yaroa is to die for! I’m literally addicted. Will definitely come back.  I recommend to everyone vegan or not. ⭐️⭐️
Love that i have a vegan option when I don't want to cook my own vegan meals and that its not far from my place

If I could purchase from NSV everyday, I definitely would! I’ve started including NSV in my budget because I’m ordering at least twice a week. I love everything about this business; the food, the people, the service and the fact that they’re in the Bronx. It’s also great that they offer specials/variety. If you haven’t eaten here, you need to whether you’re vegan or not. You will NOT be disappointed.

I’ve been to NSV several times and I always like to try something new and they never disappoint! The food, service and energy is really good! I love the truffle Mac & cheese mushroom sandwich, cauliflower wings, bbq pull pork sandwich, monfonguitos, burrito, Juny’s salad and let’s not forget the amazing pastelitos and chimi sauce! You can’t go wrong with anything choose. Vegan or not NSV will become your new go-to spot!

The best vegan food experience ever. The Quinoa Tostadas and Patacon Chimi was to die for.. Also I ordered a cute cupcake that kept my mouth watering. The customer service was great and the store was clean and covid safe... So glad to have found them and not far from my house. Best kept secret in the Bronx!
Walk in with every doubt that I would taste the difference in foods, walked out a firm believer in one step closer to turning full blown vegan!! Cannot wait to bring my friends here.

I was always interested in becoming more plant-based and Next Stop Vegan helps makes the transition so easy. I haven’t had one meal that I did not love. Everything is so flavorful and delicious and gives me a fantastic alternative.  A great addition to the neighborhood and I will recommend this place to anyone and everyone. The staff is wonderful and makes me feel like family every time I stop by. Next Stop Vegan is a gem!!!

Some of the most joyful people I have ever met and the love is in the food. They’ve helped me so much with my vegan journey. If I couldn’t enjoy some flavors from my culture, I wouldn’t know what to do! Thank you Next Stop Vegan!

VEGAN WHERE!!! LOL THIS IS THE MOST AMAZING VEGAN FOOD EVER!!! I think I'm addicted to everything on the menu, the favor is so authentic every bite is sooooooooooooo juicy and yummy!!! Lets not forget that special Spanish/ Dominican touch!!! NextStop Vegan is a MUST!!!!

Next Stop Vegan was a spot I’ve had on my list for a while, which ironically I found out about them on YouTube and ever since I’ve tried different items on her menu. My first love was the Chimi and the Chinola juice, it reminded me of my home (Dominican Republic) 🇩🇴 you can tell that the  food is made with love & care 💜💜! The real definition of comfort food. Not only is it delicious but the ingredients are beneficial to your body. I legit put everyone on even the non-vegans so they can try it for themselves. Treat yourself to some or make it a date you will love it I promise 🥰 Did I forget to mention that it’s the customer service for me ❕🤩
Great menu, fresh and flavorful food! Can't wait to order again.

I’ve had NSV twice and it has already turned into my go-to for when I want to treat myself to some amazing food. Mind you, I’m not vegan, but you don’t have to in order to love the food. The Yaroa pastelito is heaven and I can’t wait to try the whole menu !
Great Service, Great food... Always positive and very attentive! A must for Vegans and non vegans!

When I tell you the first thing that I love is the “familia” hospitality that you receive when you go there or even order on Uber. The girls alway, make sure you receive your order as accuaretly as possible, the food is absolutely DELICIOUS!!!! And if you order something that is unavailable, i love the courtesy call given! I have ordered everything on the menu but the mushroom because I am allergic and i am never disappointed. Whether you are vegan or not, I HIGHLY RECCOMEND!!!
I ordered the chimi and fries and it was delicious. The chimi is huge and I was actually able to feed myself and 2 kids with it. What a money saver.
Their CHIMI and Yarajoa Fries 😋😋😋🤤🤤🤤🤤

So I'm not a vegan however someone gave me a taste of these "wings" and I knew I had to go place an order. I brought a friend of mine as well who bought for the whole family.  I never wanted to eat cauliflower but this right here will make me eat it every week. And I also ordered the patacon and that was good as well. I can't say much for the rest of the menu but what I bought I highly recommend 👌
Food is awesome definitely try the chimi
Delicious 😋😋😋😋 I'm driving from South Jersey, ordering the entire menu and then going to drive and gorge because the food is that tasty, flavorful...
Quite honestly some of the best vegan food I've ever had
The food is delicious and they offer huge portions, enough to share.. Must try the tres leche cake.. Its PERFECT!

Did a catering order with this awesome vegan restaurant, first thing to go were the chimi sliders, food was beyond amazing and super flavorful. Thank you for the amazing vegan food and thank you for assisting me in introducing Veganism! Everyone was surprised it was actually vegan. Mom grew up eating chimis from the food trucks in the  heights and absolutely loved yours! Keep on being amazing! Best Emily P
Good fast vegan food

THE BEST DOMINICAN VEGAN FOOD IN THE BX! Possibly the best in the NY area. My non-vegan cousin put me on to NextStopVegan, and I've been hooked ever since. Before knowing about them, I hadn't had a chimi in years since I've never seen a vegan option. So as you can imagine, I was so happy when I tried theirs and it was BOMB. Their cauliflower wings are BOMB. The empanadas are BOMB (all 3 types). I'm never disappointed when with the food quality and flavor. And to top it off, everyone is always so kind. I look forward to trying all of their other food. So glad they're open every day now :)
Undeniably delicious!!
The service and Food are spectacular and the creator/ owner is there and she is super nice, make you feel home
My first time having food here and I have to say, the taste and consistency of the food is so on point!!!! you won’t notice that it’s all VEGAN! Wow just wow la calidad de comida !! 🇩🇴

I ordered from next stop vegan for dinner on 10/19 and ordered it again 10/20 for brunch and a second order for dinner. It was so delicious and a very happy meal to have two days in a row. I enjoyed the mushroom burger, burrito and 1 empanada. I can’t wait to order again, oh and it’s a plus that they’re not cheap with the portions 😊

They have such a great flavor range that you won’t even believe that their food is vegan! Thank you for providing such healthy Caribbean meals for the Bronx community. So glad to have them as a delivery option during these trying times. I can’t wait to order again soon!

Do yourself the favor and try this spot!! Food is to die for, service is great❤️ Delicious vegan twist on traditional Dominican foods 🙏🏽 Ive had several of my meat loving friends try this place and fall in love. The NSV chimi is better than most chimi food trucks in the bronx in my opinion. Oh and That chimi sauce?! Wow. Just wow. It will knock your socks off. You will not be disappointed!!  P.S get the chinola juice, you’re welcome 😉😂

First time trying my daughter and I are so pleased ☺ I can't say enough the food and drink is and was beautiful wonderful delicious 😋 😊 I will be a returning  Customer for life its that Damn!! Good 👍 tima took the juice 😭😭🤣🤣

I'm no where near vegan but I appreciate the different ways to eat fruits and veggies . I ordered the cauliflower wings with the tangy BBQ sauce and the pulled "pork" jackfruit sandwich and fries ...  I enjoyed every single bite of both the wings and sandwich . I Will be ordering here more often . Very flavorful ❤️
I ordered food from here and I wasn’t even allowed to use their restroom. I drove from far, food is good but the service is not.
The patacon is AMAZING. Great vegan spot in the bronx
Good dominican vegan food.
If I could give more than 5 Stars I would. The food here is great and taste AMAZING.
Omg, que jartura tengo. The chimi, Patacon, Jugo de chinola and Yaroa fries were the bomb.com. Drove 40 minutes and will do it again! Food was great!!!!

Friendly service and GREAT vegan food!  I enjoy all of their items.   my favorites are the Vegan Chimi and the Patacon chimi (pictured) . I also love their Pastelito de Yaroa!  Which I was going to submit a photo of, but ate instead 😆. -  Highly recommended.

WOW! You need to try this place! The food (quinoa burrito and cauliflower wings) was absolutely delicious. Service and delivery were fast and the food came in a hygienic sealed bag. Will definitely be making this my new go-to for lunch at work and hopefully they grow to some more locations soon!
My goodness! This place is the bomb! The ladies are such sweethearts and the food is amazing! The service was also super fast! Definitely going back soon!

I grew up eating the selections of food which can be found vegan by Next Stop Vegan (NSV), but not vegan. Imagine experiencing the same crunching sensation... without any worries or guilt. Eating vegan food is guilt free!  Being a vegan for quite a while now, from my experience, I miss the flavors of meat and dairy. Next Stop Vegan blessed my soul with their variety of tasty items. Check out their menu, you won’t regret eating the food there.

My boyfriend ordered something that was not on the menu and they made it for him which was cool. Unfortunately they made a mistake on my order but when I called to let them know about it I got no attitude no one tried to be slick no one tried to debate with me I was told that next time I make the order they would replace it so I did not pay. I have been here several times and From my experience I get good vibes and I like next stop vegan its the only legit vegan restuarant in the bronx that I know of, I can see and feel the love in my food! it is fresh tasty and the portions are very fair.
Omgeeee best vegan food ever. Tried the patacon, veggielito, and the The Famous Nsv Chimi amazing! You won’t be disappointed
That cook 👨‍🍳 is defense dominicano he nailed the taste perfectly can’t hardly tell the difference amazing job new favorite place. Stay Postmates accesible.

This is a long overdue review, but here it is! I absolutely love NSV's food; I've been a fan for quite sometime. I went with my friend about 3 weeks ago and he wanted to try the food out. He had the patacon and I had Juny's salad and the yaroa pastelito. OMG, it was amazing!! NSV NEVER fails. I need to go back and try other dishes. I highly recommend this restaurant to EVERYONE, not just those who are vegan. My friend is not vegan (yet) and he was highly expressed. Thank you, NSV!!

I have embarked the “health awareness” journey by slowly walking into Veganism. One Stop Vegan has helped me along the way with its Dominican flavor that are so well infused into the “meat” of the dish.  One of my favorite dishes is the Juni Salad! Light refreshing and healthy! With a sprinkle of cranberries that top off the salad zest.  Another dish to explore for its flavor is Yaroa. Flavorful combination of your Caribbean sauces layered in with the “meat” and “cheese” mixed in with a delight of spices that will have you coming for me!

Delicious, fresh & authentic 😋 my palate is in love with this yummy food and I can't wait to go back 🙏🏽 it's so hard to find a great Vegan spot and I'm so happy I found this hidden gem 🙌 strongly recommend!! you will not be disappointed ❤

I first found out about NSV when I signed up for their meal prep service. Then I officially met them at Bronx Night Market. So cool and showed mad love to all of their customers. I had the pleasure of stopping by their restaurant to order food. I got one of everything and even though I waited forever, I didn't care cause it was sooooooo worth the wait. All the staff were in good spirits so I know the food was made with ❤️❤️❤️. If you don't support this business, something is definitely wrong with you!!! Get there and get there soon!!!

Where do I start!? Best Vegan food ever and in the Bronx! I’ve almost tasted everything in their menu🥰. Prepare for your taste buds to run wild😋! Every time I order food arrives on time and always fresh!🌱👍💯

So delicious and innovative! I love to see their vegan takes on classic Dominican/latinx cuisine! Highly recommend this sweet little local shop (and they are still open during COVID so do your part to support this awesome local business)!
Great food, friendly staff and awesome vibes.
I love this place so much! They have gained a regular customer with me. Best vegan Dominican food hands down. My go to is a chimi with chinola juice. My fave combo 💜

First time ordering...The food was AMAZING, THE DELIVERY WAS QUICK, they did not have my initial order available but called me right away n allowed me 2 pick something else.  This is my new favorite place to eat! Will be ordering all the time now.

Beautiful people, great environment, and delicious food! I love everyone’s vibes! Can’t wait to be back in New York and stop at this place. It is not everyday you come in touch with this kind of hospitality. Everyone there is friendly, kind, and willing to help. 5+ stars ⭐️ Love from the Sunshine State, FL  (:
My go to! Not only is the food amazing, the owner and staff are so humble and genuine.  Try everything on the menu, you literally can't wrong!!

I’m not vegan and I honestly do not eat the real meat chimi but when it comes to NSV I do not mind waiting on my food. The place, the food and the people are extremely AMAZING!!! Can’t wait to eat a chimi, chimi pizza and of course  empanada!!! Thank you for bringing a better a healthier option to the community, keep up the GREAT JOB!!
I love that NSV is establishing a culture that is not so big in the BX--Veganism. They're bringing delicious food that anyone vegan or not will enjoy! I look forward to ordering whenever I can! #YUM
Their staff is very welcoming, friendly and hard-working, their chimi, patacon and tacos were amazing! Definitely will come back again!
This is definitely the best vegan spot in the Bronx hands down.. They  really represent Dominican style vegan Food beautifully. Costumer service is great as well. Very nice and welcoming ❤️

The best amazing vegan spot in the Bronx! Ahhh I can’t describe how good the food is here. I go as often as I can I never get over of how delicious there food is. Everything on the menu is amazing. The menu is also expanding😍 which is a bonus I haven’t had a gyro in over a year after going vegan and I finally was able to eat a vegan gyro ahhh I love this store!!! 💙🗣

Amazing experience, the food selection is absolutely amazing, and the presentation is immaculate. Truly pleasurable experience I look forward to coming here every weekend. Heads up the wait is a tad long but definitely hands down worth the wait, such nice people. I plan on trying the entire menu

A must-eat for vegans living in Bronx county. The food taste so delicious and everything was made fresh and with care. I love the vegan take on traditional Spanish dishes. I will be ordering from there again! The food was as close to perfection as it can get.

This is obviously a well known vegan spot in the Bronx. The staff was very friendly and very knowledgable about their menu. There is a small area to eat if your really wanted to eat inside, but best to order ahead and pick up. The food was AMAZING and fresh! We will be back the next time we're in town. I'm so glad we were able to make it.
Delicious!!!
First time trying this I love my favorite place thank u nsv..
Very tasty
Great staff,The vibe and food are just incredible. I Love this place
I ordered these mofongitos. & man can I tell you was this good. I loved every bit of these you couldnt even tell they had no meat. Will definitely continue ordering from here. I was really impressed
Amazing food and service! The ladies at Next Stop Vegan truly care about providing outstanding customer service and quality food. Keep it up, ladies!
Amazing
O-M-G everything is soooo good here. I love the vegan chimi, nd chimidilla lol.
The chimi was great. I fell in love the first time. Definitely going to be a regular
Great food perfect twist of Dominican dishes for us vegans.
I love the food and the vibe. Great combo. I’m so thankful to be able to have this food in the Bronx!!!

words can not describe the experience that my family just had. everything was fresh, delicious and you can taste the love that it is made with. even my mother in law who is a carnivore was impressed and said that she could totally eat vegan if it tasted this good. everyone in the store is super happy and they have the most beautiful smiles. we will definitely be coming by more often.

I wish they were open more days throughout the week, but in the meantime Fridays & Saturdays are the days I look forward to most.  I went two weekends in a row and ordered the Patacon Chimi, Yaroa French Fries, NSV Loaded Rito,  and Tamarindo juice. Everything was deliciously seasoned and my mind was blown that vegan food can be that yummy!  Aside from the food, the workers are incredibly sweet, kind and patient when I take forever to decide what I want (everything just looks so good!). Can't wait to tick off another menu item next time I visit!
Amaizing Clean food, I love how they incorporate different colors, cultures and textures. Guilt free deliciousness

Great place, atmosphere and food. You are always greeted as if you were family. Food is fresh, and finger licking good. I have ordered food from them since there location on archer opened. When I can't make it to there spot I order through postmates. My family and I are hooked on this place. This is one spot you won't regret going to. If you have a chance try to meet the owner her motivation, inspiration and positive look on life rubs off on you.

I’m Dominican and I’m vegan for over a year now and I couldn’t be happier to have stumbled upon Next Stop Vegan. Everything about the NSV experience is wonderful. The food is so good, with all of the flavors of my childhood and pre-vegan life. The staff are like family on Thanksgiving; happy, pleasant, funny and grateful for your visit. I go just about every weekend and always get that weekend’s special (or two, or more) and a regular menu item. There is a wait time because everything is made to order but it’s worth it. Just call and order for pick up if you’re in a rush. I think my favorite staple items are the truffle burger and the mofonguitos. The specials are always good. And of course, you gotta get one of their natural fruit juices (limonada, tamarindo or chinola). If they were open more often, I’d be broke. Oh, and don’t forget their meal prep service. Yes, I’ve done that too and it never disappoints. There aren’t enough words to say how great this place is. Well, I guess I just tried using most of them but it’s all well-deserved.

(Translated by Google) Next stop vegan was my first place in the Bronx to visit after I stopped eating meat. It was definitely a good choice. The mofonguitos are the end ☺️Very good food. Excellent service and of course the atmosphere and decoration make you feel much more comfortable. I can't wait to go back. Eating vegan food at NSV is much more fun.  (Original) Next stop vegan fue mi primer lugar en el Bronx  en visitar después que dejé de comer carne. Definitivamente fue una buena elección. Los mofonguitos son el final ☺️Muy buena comida. Excelente servicio y por supuesto el ambiento y la decoración te hacen sentir mucho más cómodo . I can’t wait to go back. Eating vegan food at NSV is much more fun.

Great vibes. Every dish I've tried so far has been finger licking good. Fresh everything. Worth the wait. Next time I'll call and place my order in advance if I'm pressed for time. But seriously delicious! She even makes Cupcakes!  This is my new favorite weekend spot. Bravo!
Omg omg omg!! Where have these people been all my life? The food amazing! The staff is amazing! Everything about this place is amazing!!
vegan comfort food at it's best! In the Bronx!

Wow, while traveling to visit family my husband and I decided to give this vegan place a try..we are both vegans so of course we came. Amazing place, love their food, my mother that is not a vegan yet also enjoyed the food and the girls that work here are super nice and friendly, definitely I will come back and I truly recommend it.

Amazing food, friendly service and no animals were harm. What else can you ask for. My wife and I really enjoyed their chimi and patacon. The fries were crispy & delicious and even my mother in law, who is not a vegan btw, was really amazed at how delicious the food is. Definitely a recommend 👍🏽...

Outstanding service with down to earth people. Great Environment food,juices everything was amazing/delicious and well put Menu. I will alway stop here when in the city this is everything the Bronx well nyc all together needed
Food is amazing👍👍👍👍
Long wait. Food was good.
Excelent food
It's so Bx and finally healthy options for  residents of the Bronx. FOOD IS DELICIIIIIIIIIIIOUS
Super delicious,   bursting with flavor . Traveled from New Jersey and I wasn't disappointed Vegan junk food with Dominican flare. Space was clean, nice staff. Found easy street parking.
This  place is AMAZING! just what we needed here in NY. FOOD is great and everyone is polite

Omg first off the lady behind the counter is such a sweetheart mff obatala all day every day for her. The bbq vegan pulled pork was slammmmmmin I there fries are the good type too I love the mix of Hispanic and vegan this place is a gem forreal they do need to have a better way of displaying the store name cause it was easy to pass by but over all definatly coming back no complaints. Ps drink the juices.
(Translated by Google) Good to have vegan food with good prices in the bronx. I should open daily.  (Original) Bueno tener comida vegana con buenos precios en el bronx. Debería abrir diario.
Great food
Friendly staff. Great food! Beautiful decor.  Excited to see a vegan spot in the Bronx and not far from home!

(Translated by Google) The best mofonguitos that I have eaten in my life, and do not talk about the chimi oh no but and the cake that from the first bite tells you that you should ask for at least 10, because it leaves you wanting to want more. The super sympathetic employee and the super owner receives you with a smile the super familiar atmosphere, I from NJ return to eat because the truth is worth it. I did not want to leave.  (Original) Los mejore mofonguitos que me e comido en mi vidad, y ni se hable del chimi oh no pero y los pastelito eso desde la primera mordida te da cuente que debiste pedir por lo meno 10, ya que te deja con deseo de querer mas. Los empleado super simpatico y la dueña super te recibe con una  sonrisa el ambiente super familiar, yo desde NJ regreso a comer por que la verdad que vale la pena. Yo no me quería ir.
Simply great!  The staff, the vibe and most importantly the food is amazing!  love this place!
The food was amazing & the atmosphere.

Ordered food from Postmates, have a couple of complaints to the delivery guy, but it has nothing to do with Next Stop Vegan! Great testing vegan food! My husband and I enjoyed it very much! Home-made and warming! I wish the place was open more days a week, though☺

The food is made with LOVE! You ever need that home cooked Dominican flavor in your life, Next Stop Vegan is the answer for the Bronx. I don't have to wonder what to eat next, their meal prep service has me covered. I keep telling my friends from Toronto they gotta experience it, IT'S A MUST. For all you who wonder what vegans eat, we eating GOOD REAL GOOD at Next Stop Vegan. Conscious, uncompromised, cruelty free, healthy, sustainable, DELICIOUS, wholesome food.

Great atmosphere, great service and great food. I came all the way from Midtown for my husband who is vegan to try this place out because it had such great reviews. It was busy and when we reached the counter to order we asked for recommendations being that it was our first time. Some dishes they had ran out of which was understandable so we ordered 2 dishes from the menu. Food was great and although I myself am not a vegan, I enjoyed it. Keep up the great work and we will be back soon.
username: Avah Eva Jose and friends Gaming

caption: I took the train from Brooklyn to try their food. 100% worth the trip. The food and service are great. I'm definitely going again.

Just got home with my orders of mofonguitos and all I can say is OMG. I’m not vegan, but wanted to try vegan food, and glad I decided to try it here.  I will be returning soon enough. If you’re looking for vegan food in the bronx definitely check this place out!
My first plant-based Burger awesome I can't wait to enjoy the other five meals I bought
Great Hispanic vegan food!!! I wish they were open for operation everyday!!! I love that they’re also making a difference in the Bronx community.
Their food is soooooo bomb!! 😋

The owners truly put love into this business. The food is amazing. And they show love to new and old clients, always ! So glad they are doing this not only for the latinx community but for The Bronx! #SupportLocalBusinesses
The chimi sauce and the plantains 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

A.W.E.S.O.M.E food and customer service.  Food is made from scratch and the owner herself will be there to greet you.  What else you can ask for?  The only truly vegan restaurant in The Bronx.  I'm so excited for them.
The "flat bread vegan chimi pizza' changed my life! The sauce they used to top the pizza was like  an explosion of flavor  ! I love how they mixed Latino cooking with veganism!

I had their yaroa, sancocho & Ropa Vieja. Let me tell you i instantly fell in love and I'm not even vegan. My favorite was the yaroa I didn't want it to finish so i savored every bite. If you wanna try something different, i give these guys 10 thumbs up. I can't wait to try their chimi.
